title: Tell Companies House about changes to your limited company

details.description: File changes to your company information including directors, shareholders and registered office address and where your company records are kept
details.more_information:
You must tell Companies House about changes you make to your limited company, including:

* directors and company secretaries joining or leaving
* changing your company's name, registered office address or accounting reference date
* changing where your company records are kept

^ Some changes may need you to [pass a resolution.](/running-a-limited-company/company-changes-you-must-report "Meetings and resolutions") ^

##What you need

You'll need both the:

- email address you used to sign up for the Companies House online service 
- authentication code Companies House sent you

###If you haven't used the service before

You can [register online.](https://ewf.companieshouse.gov.uk/runpage?page=webfilingRegister&signUpPage.lang=en "Register for Companies House WebFiling"){:rel="external"} Companies House will send you a password by email and an authentication code by post to your registered office address.

##When the changes take effect

Changes to your registered office address and company name don't happen until Companies House has accepted and confirmed them.
details.introduction: You must tell Companies House about specific changes you make to your limited company.
